Name: SCOOT
About the game: Scoot is a physics based scooter game made for all the scooter riders out there! Perform tricks, airs, flips, and make parks to share with your friends! The goal of Scoot is to give scooter riders around the world what they've always been wanting ever since the SKATE franchise. There's new skateboarding games, BMX games, and now, finally a scooter action sports game. Staying away from crowd sourcing, having Scoot in Early Access allows for Matt Cole to be engaged with the community and receive feedback on our journey to a the full scooter action sports game that we've all wanted for such a long time. CONTROLLER REQUIRED
